results.title: Hospitals don't burn down
results.creator_credit: Brian Trenchard-Smith, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
results.brief_description: A disturbingly realistic film about a fire in a high-rise hospital. It dramatically portrays the horror and awful consequences of such a tragedy. Demonstrates the results of good and bad training and the need for all personnel to learn basic drills and routines in case of fire. Cast includes Jeanne Drynan, Mark Edwards, Ray Marshall, Ralph Cotterill, Ken Goodlet.

results.title: The Midfield player with Trevor Brooking
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on Soccer”.
England midfield man, Trevor Brooking, one of the Football League’s most stylish players describes the importance of the midfield role. He stresses that midfield players must possess all-round ability.

results.title: Peach's Australia : The Dandenongs
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Peach’s Australia”.
The Dandenong’s are the lungs of Melbourne, and an enchanting weekend tourist resort with rare plant and animal life. Its charm is now being eroded by urban sprawl

results.title: The Most beautiful place on earth: international zone
results.creator_credit: Martin Bunnel, Pierre des Bonnet and United Nations Television
results.brief_description: Shows the scientific research undertaken on Antarctica, which has been declared open for use by all mankind for scientific and peaceful purposes. This film shows the international co-operation achieved in efforts to preserve the unique environment of the continent.

results.title: Golden Twenties
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “March of Time”.
A chronicle of America’s Jazz Age based on a study of the 1920’s by Frederick Lewis Allen and Samuel Wood Bryant. Over 150 famous people appear, including the Prince of Wales, H.G. Wells, Thomas Edison, Woodrow Wilson, Charles Lindbergh and Al Capone. Famous sporting personalities and entertainers are presented including excerpts from feature films of the era starring Rudolp Valentino, Al Jolson and Greta Garbo among others. Edited by Leo Zochling.

results.title: Quiet challenge
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Big country”.
Concerned about Australia’s lack of success in international sports aviation events, ex-businessman Bill Reilly has established a school for advanced glider-pilot training at Tokamore, N.S.W. Resident championship Ingo Reuner, aeronautical pilot and Bert Persson, engineer, display their skills and explain the fascination that gliding holds for them.

results.title: Julie, your best just isn't good enough
results.brief_description: Julie left school early and as been in and out of jobs for four years. She has been unemployed for tem months and is willing to take any job. She talks about the dole, what she does with her money and about her parents.
